item.title: Science Medium Jekyll Theme V.0.2.0
item.description:
Science Medium Jekyll Theme

Download my New Jekyll Theme - Science Medium Theme V.0.2.0

Theme Preview

Download Raw Code

The official Jekyll version of the Clean Blog theme by

View Live Demo →

Before You Begin

In the _config.yml file, the base URL is set to ### _config.yml → which is this themes gh-pages preview. It’s recommended that you remove the base URL before working with this theme locally!

It should look like this: baseurl: ""

What’s Included

A full Jekyll environment is included with this theme. If you have Jekyll installed, simply run jekyll serve in your command line and preview the build in your browser. You can use jekyll serve --watch to watch for changes in the source files as well.

A Grunt environment is also included. There are a number of tasks it performs like minification of the JavaScript, compiling of the LESS files, adding banners to keep the Apache 2.0 license intact, and watching for changes. Run the grunt default task by entering grunt into your command line which will build the files. You can use grunt watch if you are working on the JavaScript or the LESS.

You can run jekyll serve --watch and grunt watch at the same time to watch for changes and then build them all at once.

Download Jekyll ###Download Jekyll →

item.title: ssl - https over GitHub.
item.description:
Happy New Year Everybody. Good Code 2015. 1. of January! Back to work! i figure out how can i run my dev blog here on github over https. After searching the Entire! I found out, there is a simple script! This Code is writen in Javascript.

var host = "YOURDOMAIN.github.io"; if ((host == window.location.host) && (window.location.protocol != "https:")) window.location.protocol = "https";

Another Way you can get ssl is, during the Popular Cryptographic Software Library Open Source SSL which on is available on a Source Base ! Be aware of the the most biggest Hole! The Heartbleed Bug! There are many other Open Sources and Scripts. If you are good, you can both write your own self. Here some Links :


Open SSL Source Open SSL Source

Open SSL Source on Github. Open SSL Source

The Heartbleed The Heartbleed

Install

But it on your Top in the Header after some meta tags.

Transport Layer Security and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)
Open SSL Source Open SSL Source

Good Things never ending!

item.title: The dreams of yesterday are the hopes of today and the reality of tomorrow.
item.description:
This is my First Post, Hello World! I will try out to describe my Code's here on my GitHub Blog, this isn't my Official Website! I'm current working on it! also Stay Tuned! This Blog is dedicated to my Git's!

The Development Processes!

I will describe and Blog about my development Processes @ my Official Website!

The dreams of yesterday are the hopes of today and the reality of tomorrow. Science has not yet mastered prophecy. We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten.

Start Up Projects in Progress.

Visit soon my Official Website to see what we Start Up. This Blog is built with the Jekyll Blog Framework and hosted on GitHub. My Next Blog will have the Framework and Blog Ware from Ghost. From Wordpress to Jekyll and from Jekyll to Ghost.

Here is my Install Video

item.title: Jekyll set Up
item.description:
The Set Up

# Install "[Jekyll! v2.3.0](https://jekyllrb.com/)" Set Up Install Guide, Jekyll Install - _Jekyll Open Source_, with GITHUB.

You can also Host Jekyll on GITHUB. Only do you have to use is:
A Good Text Editor like
Sublime Text 3,
Termnial Command Lines from X-Code,
and of course a localhost:4000
(which you can change it to another port like
localhost:8080 with :
localserver port: PORT and Listen on the given port. --port PORT).
See more on the (see
http://jekyllrb.com/docs/configuration Serve Command Options.

The Final Frontier

#### Install Options

Linux, Unix, or Mac OS X Install
Termnial :

- sudo gem install Jekyll! v2.3.0 password: *************************

See which Version:
Version :

- jekyll -v

Set Up your Project:
Set Up :

- cd Desktop/ - jekyll new your-project-site - /users/Home/Desktop/your-project-site - cd your-project-site/ - jekyll serve

Port localhost:
localhost:

- http://0.0.0.0:4000/

Find Your Files:
Command:

- jekyll serve --watch

Others

You’ll find a lot of other variables inside the file, e.g.:

  • the site title, description, icon and default cover image.
  • text of the copyright message.
  • the number of posts per page (paginate).
  • the permalink’s structure (see the docs).

Versions

Here is a List:

Jekyll Jeykill 0.3.x
Sublime Text Sublime Text 3
GITHUB GitHub
CommandLine Tools) CommandLine

Download

Jekyll! v2.3.0 is already available for download on GitHub.

Want to see something else added or report a bug? Open an issue.

The dreams of yesterday are the hopes of today and the reality of tomorrow. Science has not yet mastered prophecy. We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten.

Reaching for the Stars

To go places and do things that have never been done before – that’s what living is all about.
